properties.description: Pipeline em desenvolvimento com informações de baixa de titulos a pagar.

source.oracleReaderQuery:
select a.nr_titulo, 
a.nr_sequencia, 
a.dt_baixa, 
a.vl_pago,
a.vl_descontos,
a.vl_juros,
a.vl_multa,
a.dt_atualizacao,
(select c.ds_tipo_baixa from TIPO_BAIXA_CPA c where c.cd_tipo_baixa = a.cd_tipo_baixa) as ds_tipo_baixa,
obter_ds_transacao(a.nr_seq_movto_trans_fin) as ds_transacao
from titulo_pagar_baixa a

properties.description:
Pipeline desenvolvido para alimentar as tableas:

Titulos_receber e Baixa_Titulos_Receber

Iniciado conferencia pelo setor de Contas a Receber das informações alimentadas por Tasy e Smart.

source.oracleReaderQuery:
SELECT  
        a.ie_tipo_titulo as NR_TIPO_TITULO,
        '' as NR_SERIE_TITULO,
        A.NR_TITULO,
        A.DT_EMISSAO as DT_EMISSAO_TITULO,
        A.DT_VENCIMENTO DT_VENCIMENTO_TITULO,
        A.VL_TITULO VL_TITULO,
        A.VL_MULTA_FIXO AS VL_MULTA,
        C.DS_CONVENIO,
        B.DS_RAZAO_SOCIAL as DS_EMPRESA_CONVENIO,
        B.CD_CGC AS CONV_CNPJ,
        0 AS VL_ISS,
        0 AS VL_IR,
        0 AS VL_FILME,
        0 AS VL_PERC_ISS,
        0 AS VL_PER_IR,
        A.TX_MULTA AS VL_PERC_MULTA,
        A.TX_JUROS AS VL_PERC_JURO,
        A.VL_OUTRAS_DESPESAS AS VL_OUTROS_IMP,
        0 AS NR_REMESSA,
        EM.NM_RAZAO_SOCIAL MARCA,
        E.NM_FANTASIA_ESTAB AS DS_UNIDADE,
        E.CD_CGC AS CNPJ,
        'TASY HTML' AS BASE,
        SYSDATE AS DT_CARGA
FROM    TITULO_RECEBER A, 
        PESSOA_JURIDICA B,
        ESTABELECIMENTO E,
        EMPRESA EM,
        CONVENIO C
where   b.cd_cgc = a.cd_cgc
AND     a.CD_ESTABELECIMENTO = E.CD_ESTABELECIMENTO
AND     E.CD_EMPRESA = EM.CD_EMPRESA
AND     B.CD_CGC = C.CD_CGC
AND     C.DT_CANCELAMENTO IS NULL

select '' nr_tipo_titulo,
obter_cgc_estabelecimento(R.CD_ESTABELECIMENTO) AS CNPJ, 
'' AS NR_SERIE_TITULO,
l.nr_titulo, 
l.dt_recebimento, 
l.vl_recebido, 
l.vl_descontos, 
l.vl_juros, 
l.vl_multa, 
l.dt_atualizacao, 
t.ds_tipo_recebimento,
x.DS_TRANSACAO,
'TASY HTML' AS BASE,
 SYSDATE AS DT_CARGA
from titulo_receber r,
     TITULO_RECEBER_LIQ L,
     tipo_recebimento t,
     TRANSACAO_FINANCEIRA X
where r.nr_titulo = l.nr_titulo 
and l.cd_tipo_recebimento = t.cd_tipo_recebimento
AND l.nr_seq_trans_fin = X.NR_SEQUENCIA

properties.description:
Pipeline desenvolvido para alimentar as tableas:

Titulos_receber e Baixa_Titulos_Receber

Iniciado conferencia pelo setor de Contas a Receber das informações alimentadas por Tasy e Smart.

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT 
        nfs.nfs_tipo as NR_TIPO_TITULO, 
        nfs.nfs_serie as NR_SERIE_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_numero as NR_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_dt_emis as DT_EMISSAO_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_dt_vcto as DT_VENCIMENTO_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_valor as VL_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_vlr_multa as VL_MULTA,   
        cnv.cnv_nome as DS_CONVENIO,   
        emp.emp_nome_fantasia as DS_EMPRESA_CONVENIO,   
		emp.emp_cgc AS CONV_CNPJ, 
        nfs.nfs_vlr_iss as VL_ISS,   
        nfs.nfs_vlr_ir as VL_IR,   
        cfg.cfg_vlrfilme as VL_FILME,   
        nfs.nfs_perc_iss as VL_PERC_ISS,   
        nfs.nfs_perc_ir as VL_PER_IR,   
        nfs.nfs_perc_multa as VL_PERC_MULTA,   
        nfs.nfs_perc_juro as VL_PERC_JURO,   
        nfs.nfs_vlr_outros_imp as VL_OUTROS_IMP,
		nfs.nfs_remessa as NR_REMESSA,
		cfg.cfg_emp as MARCA,
		cfg.cfg_emp as DS_UNIDADE,
        cfg.cfg_cgc as CNPJ,
        'SMART HOSL' AS BASE,
        GETDATE() AS DT_CARGA 
     FROM cnv,   
         emp,   
         nfs,   
         cfg,   
         MNS 
LEFT JOIN (SELECT  
       mns.mns_serie as serie, 
       mns.mns_num as numero, 
       mns.mns_nfs_serie as nfs_serie,
       mns.mns_nfs_numero as nfs_numero,
       mns.mns_nfs_tipo as nfs_tipo,    
       (SELECT sum ( m2.mns_vlr ) 
        	FROM mns m2, nfs 
			WHERE  ( m2.mns_mns_serie = mns.mns_serie ) AND 
					( m2.mns_mns_num = mns.mns_num ) AND 
               ( m2.mns_nfs_serie = nfs.nfs_serie ) AND
               ( m2.mns_nfs_numero = nfs.nfs_numero ) AND
               ( m2.mns_nfs_tipo = nfs.nfs_tipo )) AS imposto
			FROM   cnv, 
					 emp, 
					 nfs, 
					 cfg, 
					 mns 
			 WHERE ( emp.emp_cod = nfs.nfs_emp_cod) and  
				( MNS.MNS_NFS_SERIE = nfs.nfs_serie) and  
				( MNS.MNS_NFS_NUMERO = nfs.nfs_numero) and  
				( MNS.MNS_NFS_TIPO = nfs.nfs_tipo) and  
				( cnv.cnv_cod = nfs.nfs_emp_codigo ) and  
				( nfs.nfs_tipo <> 'NC' ) AND 
				( nfs.nfs_dt_vcto >= GETDATE() - 100) AND  
				( nfs.nfs_dt_vcto < GETDATE() ) AND
				( mns.mns_mns_serie is null ) AND
				( mns.mns_ind_liberado = 'S' ) AND 
				( nfs.nfs_status = 'P' ) AND 
				( 8=8 ) AND 
				NOT EXISTS ( SELECT mte.mte_serie FROM mte
									WHERE ( mte.mte_nfs_tipo = nfs.nfs_tipo ) AND
											( mte.mte_nfs_serie = nfs.nfs_serie ) AND
											( mte.mte_nfs_numero = nfs.nfs_numero ) AND
											( mte.mte_tipo in ( 'C', 'E', 'O', 'D' ) ) )
			GROUP  BY   mns.mns_serie , 
					 mns.mns_num , 
					 mns.mns_nfs_serie ,
					 mns.mns_nfs_numero ,
					 mns.mns_nfs_tipo  

) m ON m.serie = mns.mns_serie and m.numero = mns.mns_num and m.nfs_serie = mns.mns_nfs_serie and m.nfs_numero = mns.mns_nfs_numero and m.nfs_tipo = mns.mns_nfs_tipo

   WHERE ( emp.emp_cod = nfs.nfs_emp_cod) and  
         ( MNS.MNS_NFS_SERIE = nfs.nfs_serie) and  
         ( MNS.MNS_NFS_NUMERO = nfs.nfs_numero) and  
         ( MNS.MNS_NFS_TIPO = nfs.nfs_tipo) and  
         ( cnv.cnv_cod = nfs.nfs_emp_codigo ) and  
         ( nfs.nfs_tipo <> 'NC' ) AND 
			( nfs.nfs_dt_vcto >= GETDATE() - 100 ) AND  
         ( nfs.nfs_dt_vcto < GETDATE() ) AND
			( mns.mns_mns_serie is null ) AND
			( mns.mns_ind_liberado = 'S' ) AND 
			( nfs.nfs_status = 'P' ) AND 
			( 8=8 ) AND 
			NOT EXISTS ( SELECT mte.mte_serie FROM mte
								WHERE ( mte.mte_nfs_tipo = nfs.nfs_tipo ) AND
										( mte.mte_nfs_serie = nfs.nfs_serie ) AND
										( mte.mte_nfs_numero = nfs.nfs_numero ) AND
										( mte.mte_tipo in ( 'C', 'E', 'O', 'D' ) ) ) 
GROUP BY nfs.nfs_tipo,   
         nfs.nfs_serie,   
         nfs.nfs_numero,   
         nfs.nfs_dt_emis,   
         nfs.nfs_dt_vcto,   
         nfs.nfs_valor,   
         nfs.nfs_vlr_multa,   
         cnv.cnv_nome,   
         emp.emp_nome_fantasia,   
         nfs.nfs_emp_codigo,   
         nfs.nfs_emp_cod,   
         nfs.nfs_vlr_iss,   
         cfg.cfg_emp,   
         cnv.cnv_ccr_banco,    
         cfg.cfg_vlrfilme,   
         nfs.nfs_perc_iss,   
         nfs.nfs_perc_ir,   
         nfs.nfs_perc_multa,   
         nfs.nfs_remessa,   
         cfg.cfg_tol_ent_diaria,   
         nfs.nfs_perc_juro,   
         nfs.nfs_vlr_outros_imp,   
         MNS.MNS_DT,   
         MNS.MNS_TIPO, 
		 MNS.MNS_NFS_TIPO, 
		 mns.mns_mns_serie, 
		 mns.mns_mns_num, 
		 mns.mns_serie, 
		 mns.mns_num, 
		 cfg.cfg_vlrfilme, 
		 nfs.nfs_nde_tipo, 
		 nfs.nfs_vlr_ir, 
		 mns.mns_obs,
		 nfs.nfs_ind_tipo_fatura,
		 nfs.nfs_nfl_serie, 
		 nfs.nfs_nfl_num,
		 mns.mns_nfl_serie,
		 mns.mns_nfl_num,
		 nfs.nfs_dt_receb,
		 cfg.cfg_vlrfilme,
		 nfs.nfs_dt_envio,
		 nfs.nfs_ns_serie, 
		 nfs.nfs_ns_numero, 	
		 cnv.cnv_caixa_fatura,
         cfg.cfg_cgc,
		 emp.emp_cgc 

UNION ALL   

  SELECT top 10 
        nfs.nfs_tipo as NR_TIPO_TITULO, 
        nfs.nfs_serie as NR_SERIE_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_numero as NR_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_dt_emis as DT_EMISSAO_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_dt_vcto as DT_VENCIMENTO_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_valor as VL_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_vlr_multa as VL_MULTA,   
        cnv.cnv_nome as DS_CONVENIO,   
        emp.emp_nome_fantasia as DS_EMPRESA_CONVENIO,   
		emp.emp_cgc AS CONV_CNPJ, 
        nfs.nfs_vlr_iss as VL_ISS,   
        nfs.nfs_vlr_ir as VL_IR,   
        cfg.cfg_vlrfilme as VL_FILME,   
        nfs.nfs_perc_iss as VL_PERC_ISS,   
        nfs.nfs_perc_ir as VL_PER_IR,   
        nfs.nfs_perc_multa as VL_PERC_MULTA,   
        nfs.nfs_perc_juro as VL_PERC_JURO,   
        nfs.nfs_vlr_outros_imp as VL_OUTROS_IMP,
		nfs.nfs_remessa as NR_REMESSA,
		cfg.cfg_emp as MARCA,
		cfg.cfg_emp as DS_UNIDADE,
        cfg.cfg_cgc as CNPJ,
        'SMART HOSL' AS BASE,
        GETDATE() AS DT_CARGA 
    FROM cnv,   
         emp,   
         nfs,   
         cfg,   
         MNS, 
			nfs b  
   WHERE ( emp.emp_cod = nfs.nfs_emp_cod) and  
			( MNS.MNS_NFS_SERIE = b.nfs_serie) and  
         ( MNS.MNS_NFS_NUMERO = b.nfs_numero) and  
         ( MNS.MNS_NFS_TIPO = b.nfs_tipo) and  
         ( nfs.NFS_SERIE = b.nfs_ns_serie ) and  
         ( nfs.NFS_NUMERO = b.nfs_ns_numero ) and  
         ( nfs.NFS_TIPO = b.nfs_ns_tipo) and  
         ( cnv.cnv_cod = nfs.nfs_emp_codigo ) and  
         ( nfs.nfs_tipo <> 'NC' ) AND 
			--( nfs.nfs_tipo in ( :a_sNfsTipos ) ) AND
			( nfs.nfs_dt_vcto >= GETDATE() - 100 ) AND  
         ( nfs.nfs_dt_vcto < GETDATE() ) AND
			( mns.mns_mns_serie is null ) AND
			( mns.mns_ind_liberado = 'S' ) AND 
			( nfs.nfs_status = 'P' ) AND 
			( 8=8 ) AND 	
			NOT EXISTS ( SELECT mte.mte_serie FROM mte
								WHERE ( mte.mte_nfs_tipo = nfs.nfs_tipo ) AND
										( mte.mte_nfs_serie = nfs.nfs_serie ) AND
										( mte.mte_nfs_numero = nfs.nfs_numero ) AND
										( mte.mte_tipo in ( 'C', 'E', 'O', 'D' ) ) )
GROUP BY nfs.nfs_tipo,   
         nfs.nfs_serie,   
         nfs.nfs_numero,   
         nfs.nfs_dt_emis,   
         nfs.nfs_dt_vcto,   
         nfs.nfs_valor,   
         nfs.nfs_vlr_multa,   
         cnv.cnv_nome,   
         emp.emp_nome_fantasia,   
         nfs.nfs_emp_codigo,   
         nfs.nfs_emp_cod,   
         nfs.nfs_vlr_iss,   
         cfg.cfg_emp,   
         cnv.cnv_ccr_banco,   
         nfs.nfs_vlr_ir,   
         cfg.cfg_vlrfilme,   
         nfs.nfs_perc_iss,   
         nfs.nfs_perc_ir,   
         nfs.nfs_perc_multa,   
         nfs.nfs_remessa,   
         cfg.cfg_tol_ent_diaria,   
         nfs.nfs_perc_juro,   
         nfs.nfs_vlr_outros_imp,   
         CASE WHEN mns.mns_tipo = 'NR' THEN b.nfs_dt_vcto ELSE MNS.MNS_DT END,   
         MNS.MNS_TIPO, 
		 MNS.MNS_NFS_TIPO, 
		 mns.mns_mns_serie, 
		 mns.mns_mns_num, 
		 mns.mns_serie, 
		 mns.mns_num, 
		 b.nfs_nde_tipo, 
		 nfs.nfs_vlr_ir, 
		 mns.mns_obs, 
		 nfs.nfs_ind_tipo_fatura,
		 nfs.nfs_nfl_serie, 
		 nfs.nfs_nfl_num, 
		 mns.mns_nfl_serie,
		 mns.mns_nfl_num,
		 nfs.nfs_dt_receb,
		 nfs.nfs_dt_envio,
		 nfs.nfs_ns_serie, 
		 nfs.nfs_ns_numero, 	
		 cnv.cnv_caixa_fatura,
         cfg.cfg_cgc,
		 emp.emp_cgc

UNION ALL 

  SELECT top 10 
        nfs.nfs_tipo as NR_TIPO_TITULO, 
        nfs.nfs_serie as NR_SERIE_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_numero as NR_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_dt_emis as DT_EMISSAO_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_dt_vcto as DT_VENCIMENTO_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_valor as VL_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_vlr_multa as VL_MULTA,   
        cnv.cnv_nome as DS_CONVENIO,   
        emp.emp_nome_fantasia as DS_EMPRESA_CONVENIO,   
		emp.emp_cgc AS CONV_CNPJ, 
        nfs.nfs_vlr_iss as VL_ISS,   
        nfs.nfs_vlr_ir as VL_IR,   
        cfg.cfg_vlrfilme as VL_FILME,   
        nfs.nfs_perc_iss as VL_PERC_ISS,   
        nfs.nfs_perc_ir as VL_PER_IR,   
        nfs.nfs_perc_multa as VL_PERC_MULTA,   
        nfs.nfs_perc_juro as VL_PERC_JURO,   
        nfs.nfs_vlr_outros_imp as VL_OUTROS_IMP,
		nfs.nfs_remessa as NR_REMESSA,
		cfg.cfg_emp as MARCA,
		cfg.cfg_emp as DS_UNIDADE,
        cfg.cfg_cgc as CNPJ,
        'SMART HOSL' AS BASE,
        GETDATE() AS DT_CARGA     
    FROM cnv,   
         emp,   
         nfs,   
         cfg  
   WHERE ( emp.emp_cod = nfs.nfs_emp_cod) and  
         ( cnv.cnv_cod = nfs.nfs_emp_codigo ) and  
         ( nfs.nfs_dt_vcto >= GETDATE()  - 100) AND  
         ( nfs.nfs_dt_vcto < GETDATE() ) AND  
         ( nfs.nfs_tipo <> 'NC' ) AND
			( nfs.nfs_status = 'P' ) AND 
			--( nfs.nfs_tipo in ( :a_sNfsTipos ) ) AND 
			NOT EXISTS ( SELECT mte.mte_serie FROM mte
								WHERE ( mte.mte_nfs_tipo = nfs.nfs_tipo ) AND
										( mte.mte_nfs_serie = nfs.nfs_serie ) AND
										( mte.mte_nfs_numero = nfs.nfs_numero ) AND
										( mte.mte_tipo in ( 'C', 'E', 'O', 'D' ) ) ) AND
			NOT EXISTS ( SELECT MNS.MNS_NUM FROM MNS 
								WHERE ( mns.mns_ind_liberado = 'S' ) AND 
										( 8=8 ) AND 
										( MNS.MNS_NFS_SERIE = nfs.nfs_serie) and  
							         ( MNS.MNS_NFS_NUMERO = nfs.nfs_numero) and  
							         ( MNS.MNS_NFS_TIPO = nfs.nfs_tipo) ) 
 -------------- OK  2
UNION ALL 

  SELECT top 10 
        nfs.nfs_tipo as NR_TIPO_TITULO, 
        nfs.nfs_serie as NR_SERIE_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_numero as NR_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_dt_emis as DT_EMISSAO_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_dt_vcto as DT_VENCIMENTO_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_valor as VL_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_vlr_multa as VL_MULTA,   
        cnv.cnv_nome as DS_CONVENIO,   
        emp.emp_nome_fantasia as DS_EMPRESA_CONVENIO,   
		emp.emp_cgc AS CONV_CNPJ, 
        nfs.nfs_vlr_iss as VL_ISS,   
        nfs.nfs_vlr_ir as VL_IR,   
        cfg.cfg_vlrfilme as VL_FILME,   
        nfs.nfs_perc_iss as VL_PERC_ISS,   
        nfs.nfs_perc_ir as VL_PER_IR,   
        nfs.nfs_perc_multa as VL_PERC_MULTA,   
        nfs.nfs_perc_juro as VL_PERC_JURO,   
        nfs.nfs_vlr_outros_imp as VL_OUTROS_IMP,
		nfs.nfs_remessa as NR_REMESSA,
		cfg.cfg_emp as MARCA,
		cfg.cfg_emp as DS_UNIDADE,
        cfg.cfg_cgc as CNPJ,
        'SMART HOSL' AS BASE,
        GETDATE() AS DT_CARGA  
     FROM cnv,   
         emp,   
         nfs,   
         cfg,   
         MNS,
			mte, 
			rdi,
			pac   
   WHERE ( emp.emp_cod = nfs.nfs_emp_cod ) and  
         ( MNS.MNS_NFS_SERIE = nfs.nfs_serie) and  
         ( MNS.MNS_NFS_NUMERO = nfs.nfs_numero) and  
         ( MNS.MNS_NFS_TIPO = nfs.nfs_tipo) and  
         ( cnv.cnv_cod = nfs.nfs_emp_codigo ) and  
         ( nfs.nfs_tipo = 'NC' ) AND 
			--( nfs.nfs_tipo in ( :a_sNfsTipos ) ) AND
		 ( rdi.rdi_vcto >= GETDATE() - 100 ) AND  
         ( rdi.rdi_vcto < GETDATE() ) AND
		 ( rdi.rdi_forma_pag <> 'U' ) AND 
		 ( rdi.rdi_recepcao <> 'S' ) AND 
		 ( mns.mns_mns_serie is null ) AND
		 ( mns.mns_ind_liberado = 'S' ) AND 
		 ( nfs.nfs_status = 'P' ) AND 
		 ( mte.mte_pac_reg = pac.pac_reg ) AND 
		 ( mte.mte_nfs_tipo = nfs.nfs_tipo ) AND
		 ( mte.mte_nfs_serie = nfs.nfs_serie ) AND
		 ( mte.mte_nfs_numero = nfs.nfs_numero ) AND
		 ( mte.mte_status = 'D' ) AND 
		 ( mte.mte_tipo not in ( 'E', 'D' ) ) AND
		 ( 8=8 ) AND 
		 ( mte.mte_serie = rdi.rdi_mte_serie ) AND
		 ( mte.mte_seq = rdi.rdi_mte_seq ) AND
		 ( rdi.rdi_mns_serie = mns.mns_serie ) AND
		 ( rdi.rdi_mns_num = mns.mns_num ) AND 
		 ( rdi.rdi_mcc_serie_dep is not null ) AND 
		 ( ( mte.mte_tipo <> 'C' ) OR
			  ( EXISTS ( SELECT tca_cod FROM tca
								WHERE ( tca.tca_cod = mte.mte_tca_cod ) AND
										( tca.tca_ind_cr = 'S' ) ) ) OR 
			  ( EXISTS ( SELECT udp_valor FROM udp 
								WHERE ( udp.udp_mte_serie_dep = mte.mte_serie ) AND
										( udp.udp_mte_seq_dep = mte.mte_seq ) ) ) ) 

---- OK 3

UNION ALL 

  SELECT  top 10 
        nfs.nfs_tipo as NR_TIPO_TITULO, 
        nfs.nfs_serie as NR_SERIE_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_numero as NR_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_dt_emis as DT_EMISSAO_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_dt_vcto as DT_VENCIMENTO_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_valor as VL_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_vlr_multa as VL_MULTA,   
        cnv.cnv_nome as DS_CONVENIO,   
        emp.emp_nome_fantasia as DS_EMPRESA_CONVENIO,   
		emp.emp_cgc AS CONV_CNPJ, 
        nfs.nfs_vlr_iss as VL_ISS,   
        nfs.nfs_vlr_ir as VL_IR,   
        cfg.cfg_vlrfilme as VL_FILME,   
        nfs.nfs_perc_iss as VL_PERC_ISS,   
        nfs.nfs_perc_ir as VL_PER_IR,   
        nfs.nfs_perc_multa as VL_PERC_MULTA,   
        nfs.nfs_perc_juro as VL_PERC_JURO,   
        nfs.nfs_vlr_outros_imp as VL_OUTROS_IMP,
		nfs.nfs_remessa as NR_REMESSA,
		cfg.cfg_emp as MARCA,
		cfg.cfg_emp as DS_UNIDADE,
        cfg.cfg_cgc as CNPJ,
        'SMART HOSL' AS BASE,
        GETDATE() AS DT_CARGA 
     FROM cnv,   
         emp,   
         nfs,   
         cfg,   
			mte, 
			rdi,
			pac   
   WHERE ( emp.emp_cod = nfs.nfs_emp_cod ) and  
         ( cnv.cnv_cod = nfs.nfs_emp_codigo ) and  
         ( nfs.nfs_tipo = 'NC' ) AND 
		 ( rdi.rdi_vcto >= GETDATE() - 100 ) AND  
         ( rdi.rdi_vcto < GETDATE() ) AND
		 ( rdi.rdi_forma_pag <> 'U' ) AND 
		 ( rdi.rdi_recepcao <> 'S' ) AND 
		 ( nfs.nfs_status = 'P' ) AND 
		 ( mte.mte_pac_reg = pac.pac_reg ) AND 
		 ( mte.mte_nfs_tipo = nfs.nfs_tipo ) AND
		 ( mte.mte_nfs_serie = nfs.nfs_serie ) AND
		 ( mte.mte_nfs_numero = nfs.nfs_numero ) AND
		 ( mte.mte_status = 'D' ) AND 
		 ( mte.mte_tipo not in ( 'E', 'D' ) ) AND
		 ( mte.mte_serie = rdi.rdi_mte_serie ) AND
		 ( mte.mte_seq = rdi.rdi_mte_seq ) AND
		 ( ( mte.mte_tipo <> 'C' ) OR
			  ( EXISTS ( SELECT tca_cod FROM tca
								WHERE ( tca.tca_cod = mte.mte_tca_cod ) AND
										( tca.tca_ind_cr = 'S' ) ) ) OR 
			  ( EXISTS ( SELECT udp_valor FROM udp 
								WHERE ( udp.udp_mte_serie_dep = mte.mte_serie ) AND
										( udp.udp_mte_seq_dep = mte.mte_seq ) ) ) ) AND 
			( ( rdi.rdi_mcc_serie_dep is null ) OR 
			  ( rdi.rdi_forma_pag = 'X' ) OR 
			  ( rdi.rdi_seq_subst is null AND 
				 NOT EXISTS ( SELECT mns.mns_serie FROM mns
									WHERE ( rdi.rdi_mns_serie = mns.mns_serie ) AND
											( rdi.rdi_mns_num = mns.mns_num ) AND
											( mns.mns_ind_liberado = 'S' ) ) ) ) 
 ------- OK 4
UNION ALL 

  SELECT  top 10 
        nfs.nfs_tipo as NR_TIPO_TITULO, 
        nfs.nfs_serie as NR_SERIE_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_numero as NR_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_dt_emis as DT_EMISSAO_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_dt_vcto as DT_VENCIMENTO_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_valor as VL_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_vlr_multa as VL_MULTA,   
        cnv.cnv_nome as DS_CONVENIO,   
        emp.emp_nome_fantasia as DS_EMPRESA_CONVENIO,   
		emp.emp_cgc AS CONV_CNPJ, 
        nfs.nfs_vlr_iss as VL_ISS,   
        nfs.nfs_vlr_ir as VL_IR,   
        cfg.cfg_vlrfilme as VL_FILME,   
        nfs.nfs_perc_iss as VL_PERC_ISS,   
        nfs.nfs_perc_ir as VL_PER_IR,   
        nfs.nfs_perc_multa as VL_PERC_MULTA,   
        nfs.nfs_perc_juro as VL_PERC_JURO,   
        nfs.nfs_vlr_outros_imp as VL_OUTROS_IMP,
		nfs.nfs_remessa as NR_REMESSA,
		cfg.cfg_emp as MARCA,
		cfg.cfg_emp as DS_UNIDADE,
        cfg.cfg_cgc as CNPJ,
        'SMART HOSL' AS BASE,
        GETDATE() AS DT_CARGA  
     FROM cnv,   
         emp,   
         nfs,   
         cfg,   
         MNS,
			mte, 
			rdi,
			pac, 
			rdi b   
   WHERE ( emp.emp_cod = nfs.nfs_emp_cod ) and  
         ( MNS.MNS_NFS_SERIE = nfs.nfs_serie) and  
         ( MNS.MNS_NFS_NUMERO = nfs.nfs_numero) and  
         ( MNS.MNS_NFS_TIPO = nfs.nfs_tipo) and  
         ( cnv.cnv_cod = nfs.nfs_emp_codigo ) and  
         ( nfs.nfs_tipo = 'NC' ) AND 
		 ( rdi.rdi_vcto >= GETDATE()-100 ) AND  
         ( rdi.rdi_vcto < GETDATE() ) AND
		 ( rdi.rdi_forma_pag <> 'U' ) AND 
		 ( rdi.rdi_recepcao <> 'S' ) AND 
		 ( mns.mns_mns_serie is null ) AND
		 ( mns.mns_ind_liberado = 'S' ) AND 
		 ( nfs.nfs_status = 'P' ) AND 
		 ( mte.mte_pac_reg = pac.pac_reg ) AND 
		 ( mte.mte_nfs_tipo = nfs.nfs_tipo ) AND
		 ( mte.mte_nfs_serie = nfs.nfs_serie ) AND
		 ( mte.mte_nfs_numero = nfs.nfs_numero ) AND
		 ( mte.mte_status = 'D' ) AND 
		 ( mte.mte_tipo not in ( 'E', 'D' ) ) AND
		 ( 8=8 ) AND 
		 ( mte.mte_serie = rdi.rdi_mte_serie ) AND
		 ( mte.mte_seq = rdi.rdi_mte_seq ) AND
		 ( b.rdi_mte_serie = rdi.rdi_mte_serie ) AND
		 ( b.rdi_mte_seq = rdi.rdi_mte_seq ) AND
		 ( b.rdi_seq = rdi.rdi_seq_subst ) AND 
		 ( b.rdi_mns_serie = mns.mns_serie ) AND
		 ( b.rdi_mns_num = mns.mns_num ) AND 
		 ( rdi.rdi_mcc_serie_dep is not null ) AND 
		 ( ( mte.mte_tipo <> 'C' ) OR
		   ( EXISTS ( SELECT tca_cod FROM tca
		 					WHERE ( tca.tca_cod = mte.mte_tca_cod ) AND
										( tca.tca_ind_cr = 'S' ) ) ) OR 
			  ( EXISTS ( SELECT udp_valor FROM udp 
								WHERE ( udp.udp_mte_serie_dep = mte.mte_serie ) AND
										( udp.udp_mte_seq_dep = mte.mte_seq ) ) ) )

SELECT  top 100
  nfs.nfs_tipo  as NR_TIPO_TITULO,
  cfg.cfg_cgc as CNPJ,

  nfs.nfs_serie as NR_SERIE_TITULO,   
  nfs.nfs_numero as NR_TITULO,  
  MNS_DT as DT_RECEBIMENTO,
  MNS_VLR AS VL_RECEBIDO,
  0.00 AS VL_DESCONTOS,
  0.00 AS VL_JUROS, 
  NFS_VLR_MULTA AS VL_MULTA,
  MNS_DT AS DT_ATUALIZACAO,
  MNS_TIPO AS DS_TIPO_RECEBIMENTO,
  ' ' AS DS_TRANSACAO,
   'SMART HOSL' AS BASE,
   GETDATE() AS DT_CARGA 
   FROM mns ,           
   cfg ,           
   nfs  
   WHERE ( nfs.nfs_serie = mns.mns_nfs_serie ) 
   and ( nfs.nfs_numero = mns.mns_nfs_numero ) 
   and ( nfs.nfs_tipo = mns.mns_nfs_tipo ) 
   and ( mns.mns_mns_serie is null )

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT 
        nfs.nfs_tipo as NR_TIPO_TITULO, 
        nfs.nfs_serie as NR_SERIE_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_numero as NR_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_dt_emis as DT_EMISSAO_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_dt_vcto as DT_VENCIMENTO_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_valor as VL_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_vlr_multa as VL_MULTA,   
        cnv.cnv_nome as DS_CONVENIO,   
        emp.emp_nome_fantasia as DS_EMPRESA_CONVENIO,   
		emp.emp_cgc AS CONV_CNPJ, 
        nfs.nfs_vlr_iss as VL_ISS,   
        nfs.nfs_vlr_ir as VL_IR,   
        cfg.cfg_vlrfilme as VL_FILME,   
        nfs.nfs_perc_iss as VL_PERC_ISS,   
        nfs.nfs_perc_ir as VL_PER_IR,   
        nfs.nfs_perc_multa as VL_PERC_MULTA,   
        nfs.nfs_perc_juro as VL_PERC_JURO,   
        nfs.nfs_vlr_outros_imp as VL_OUTROS_IMP,
		nfs.nfs_remessa as NR_REMESSA,
		cfg.cfg_emp as MARCA,
		cfg.cfg_emp as DS_UNIDADE,
        cfg.cfg_cgc as CNPJ,
        'SMART INOB' AS BASE,
        GETDATE() AS DT_CARGA 
     FROM cnv,   
         emp,   
         nfs,   
         cfg,   
         MNS 
LEFT JOIN (SELECT  
       mns.mns_serie as serie, 
       mns.mns_num as numero, 
       mns.mns_nfs_serie as nfs_serie,
       mns.mns_nfs_numero as nfs_numero,
       mns.mns_nfs_tipo as nfs_tipo,    
       (SELECT sum ( m2.mns_vlr ) 
        	FROM mns m2, nfs 
			WHERE  ( m2.mns_mns_serie = mns.mns_serie ) AND 
					( m2.mns_mns_num = mns.mns_num ) AND 
               ( m2.mns_nfs_serie = nfs.nfs_serie ) AND
               ( m2.mns_nfs_numero = nfs.nfs_numero ) AND
               ( m2.mns_nfs_tipo = nfs.nfs_tipo )) AS imposto
			FROM   cnv, 
					 emp, 
					 nfs, 
					 cfg, 
					 mns 
			 WHERE ( emp.emp_cod = nfs.nfs_emp_cod) and  
				( MNS.MNS_NFS_SERIE = nfs.nfs_serie) and  
				( MNS.MNS_NFS_NUMERO = nfs.nfs_numero) and  
				( MNS.MNS_NFS_TIPO = nfs.nfs_tipo) and  
				( cnv.cnv_cod = nfs.nfs_emp_codigo ) and  
				( nfs.nfs_tipo <> 'NC' ) AND 
				( nfs.nfs_dt_vcto >= GETDATE() - 100) AND  
				( nfs.nfs_dt_vcto < GETDATE() ) AND
				( mns.mns_mns_serie is null ) AND
				( mns.mns_ind_liberado = 'S' ) AND 
				( nfs.nfs_status = 'P' ) AND 
				( 8=8 ) AND 
				NOT EXISTS ( SELECT mte.mte_serie FROM mte
									WHERE ( mte.mte_nfs_tipo = nfs.nfs_tipo ) AND
											( mte.mte_nfs_serie = nfs.nfs_serie ) AND
											( mte.mte_nfs_numero = nfs.nfs_numero ) AND
											( mte.mte_tipo in ( 'C', 'E', 'O', 'D' ) ) )
			GROUP  BY   mns.mns_serie , 
					 mns.mns_num , 
					 mns.mns_nfs_serie ,
					 mns.mns_nfs_numero ,
					 mns.mns_nfs_tipo  

) m ON m.serie = mns.mns_serie and m.numero = mns.mns_num and m.nfs_serie = mns.mns_nfs_serie and m.nfs_numero = mns.mns_nfs_numero and m.nfs_tipo = mns.mns_nfs_tipo

   WHERE ( emp.emp_cod = nfs.nfs_emp_cod) and  
         ( MNS.MNS_NFS_SERIE = nfs.nfs_serie) and  
         ( MNS.MNS_NFS_NUMERO = nfs.nfs_numero) and  
         ( MNS.MNS_NFS_TIPO = nfs.nfs_tipo) and  
         ( cnv.cnv_cod = nfs.nfs_emp_codigo ) and  
         ( nfs.nfs_tipo <> 'NC' ) AND 
			( nfs.nfs_dt_vcto >= GETDATE() - 100 ) AND  
         ( nfs.nfs_dt_vcto < GETDATE() ) AND
			( mns.mns_mns_serie is null ) AND
			( mns.mns_ind_liberado = 'S' ) AND 
			( nfs.nfs_status = 'P' ) AND 
			( 8=8 ) AND 
			NOT EXISTS ( SELECT mte.mte_serie FROM mte
								WHERE ( mte.mte_nfs_tipo = nfs.nfs_tipo ) AND
										( mte.mte_nfs_serie = nfs.nfs_serie ) AND
										( mte.mte_nfs_numero = nfs.nfs_numero ) AND
										( mte.mte_tipo in ( 'C', 'E', 'O', 'D' ) ) ) 
GROUP BY nfs.nfs_tipo,   
         nfs.nfs_serie,   
         nfs.nfs_numero,   
         nfs.nfs_dt_emis,   
         nfs.nfs_dt_vcto,   
         nfs.nfs_valor,   
         nfs.nfs_vlr_multa,   
         cnv.cnv_nome,   
         emp.emp_nome_fantasia,   
         nfs.nfs_emp_codigo,   
         nfs.nfs_emp_cod,   
         nfs.nfs_vlr_iss,   
         cfg.cfg_emp,   
         cnv.cnv_ccr_banco,    
         cfg.cfg_vlrfilme,   
         nfs.nfs_perc_iss,   
         nfs.nfs_perc_ir,   
         nfs.nfs_perc_multa,   
         nfs.nfs_remessa,   
         cfg.cfg_tol_ent_diaria,   
         nfs.nfs_perc_juro,   
         nfs.nfs_vlr_outros_imp,   
         MNS.MNS_DT,   
         MNS.MNS_TIPO, 
		 MNS.MNS_NFS_TIPO, 
		 mns.mns_mns_serie, 
		 mns.mns_mns_num, 
		 mns.mns_serie, 
		 mns.mns_num, 
		 cfg.cfg_vlrfilme, 
		 nfs.nfs_nde_tipo, 
		 nfs.nfs_vlr_ir, 
		 mns.mns_obs,
		 nfs.nfs_ind_tipo_fatura,
		 nfs.nfs_nfl_serie, 
		 nfs.nfs_nfl_num,
		 mns.mns_nfl_serie,
		 mns.mns_nfl_num,
		 nfs.nfs_dt_receb,
		 cfg.cfg_vlrfilme,
		 nfs.nfs_dt_envio,
		 nfs.nfs_ns_serie, 
		 nfs.nfs_ns_numero, 	
		 cnv.cnv_caixa_fatura,
         cfg.cfg_cgc,
		 emp.emp_cgc 

UNION ALL   

  SELECT top 10 
        nfs.nfs_tipo as NR_TIPO_TITULO, 
        nfs.nfs_serie as NR_SERIE_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_numero as NR_TITULO,

		cfg.cfg_emp as DS_UNIDADE,

        'SMART INOB' AS BASE,
        GETDATE() AS DT_CARGA 
    FROM cnv,   
         emp,   
         nfs,   
         cfg,   
         MNS, 
			nfs b  
   WHERE ( emp.emp_cod = nfs.nfs_emp_cod) and  
			( MNS.MNS_NFS_SERIE = b.nfs_serie) and  
         ( MNS.MNS_NFS_NUMERO = b.nfs_numero) and  
         ( MNS.MNS_NFS_TIPO = b.nfs_tipo) and  
         ( nfs.NFS_SERIE = b.nfs_ns_serie ) and  
         ( nfs.NFS_NUMERO = b.nfs_ns_numero ) and  
         ( nfs.NFS_TIPO = b.nfs_ns_tipo) and  
         ( cnv.cnv_cod = nfs.nfs_emp_codigo ) and  
         ( nfs.nfs_tipo <> 'NC' ) AND 
			--( nfs.nfs_tipo in ( :a_sNfsTipos ) ) AND
			( nfs.nfs_dt_vcto >= GETDATE() - 100 ) AND  
         ( nfs.nfs_dt_vcto < GETDATE() ) AND
			( mns.mns_mns_serie is null ) AND

										( mte.mte_nfs_numero = nfs.nfs_numero ) AND
										( mte.mte_tipo in ( 'C', 'E', 'O', 'D' ) ) )
GROUP BY nfs.nfs_tipo,   
         nfs.nfs_serie,

         nfs.nfs_dt_vcto,

         CASE WHEN mns.mns_tipo = 'NR' THEN b.nfs_dt_vcto ELSE MNS.MNS_DT END,

		 mns.mns_nfl_num,
		 nfs.nfs_dt_receb,
		 nfs.nfs_dt_envio,
		 nfs.nfs_ns_serie, 
		 nfs.nfs_ns_numero, 	
		 cnv.cnv_caixa_fatura,
         cfg.cfg_cgc,
		 emp.emp_cgc

UNION ALL

    FROM cnv,

								WHERE ( mte.mte_nfs_tipo = nfs.nfs_tipo ) AND

										( mte.mte_nfs_numero = nfs.nfs_numero ) AND

			NOT EXISTS ( SELECT MNS.MNS_NUM FROM MNS

										( 8=8 ) AND

		nfs.nfs_remessa as NR_REMESSA,

   WHERE ( emp.emp_cod = nfs.nfs_emp_cod ) and  
         ( MNS.MNS_NFS_SERIE = nfs.nfs_serie) and  
         ( MNS.MNS_NFS_NUMERO = nfs.nfs_numero) and  
         ( MNS.MNS_NFS_TIPO = nfs.nfs_tipo) and  
         ( cnv.cnv_cod = nfs.nfs_emp_codigo ) and  
         ( nfs.nfs_tipo = 'NC' ) AND 
			--( nfs.nfs_tipo in ( :a_sNfsTipos ) ) AND
		 ( rdi.rdi_vcto >= GETDATE() - 100 ) AND  
         ( rdi.rdi_vcto < GETDATE() ) AND
		 ( rdi.rdi_forma_pag <> 'U' ) AND 
		 ( rdi.rdi_recepcao <> 'S' ) AND 
		 ( mns.mns_mns_serie is null ) AND
		 ( mns.mns_ind_liberado = 'S' ) AND 
		 ( nfs.nfs_status = 'P' ) AND 
		 ( mte.mte_pac_reg = pac.pac_reg ) AND 
		 ( mte.mte_nfs_tipo = nfs.nfs_tipo ) AND
		 ( mte.mte_nfs_serie = nfs.nfs_serie ) AND
		 ( mte.mte_nfs_numero = nfs.nfs_numero ) AND
		 ( mte.mte_status = 'D' ) AND 
		 ( mte.mte_tipo not in ( 'E', 'D' ) ) AND
		 ( 8=8 ) AND 
		 ( mte.mte_serie = rdi.rdi_mte_serie ) AND
		 ( mte.mte_seq = rdi.rdi_mte_seq ) AND
		 ( rdi.rdi_mns_serie = mns.mns_serie ) AND
		 ( rdi.rdi_mns_num = mns.mns_num ) AND 
		 ( rdi.rdi_mcc_serie_dep is not null ) AND 
		 ( ( mte.mte_tipo <> 'C' ) OR
			  ( EXISTS ( SELECT tca_cod FROM tca
								WHERE ( tca.tca_cod = mte.mte_tca_cod ) AND
										( tca.tca_ind_cr = 'S' ) ) ) OR 
			  ( EXISTS ( SELECT udp_valor FROM udp 
								WHERE ( udp.udp_mte_serie_dep = mte.mte_serie ) AND
										( udp.udp_mte_seq_dep = mte.mte_seq ) ) ) ) 

---- OK 3

UNION ALL 

  SELECT  top 10 
        nfs.nfs_tipo as NR_TIPO_TITULO, 
        nfs.nfs_serie as NR_SERIE_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_numero as NR_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_dt_emis as DT_EMISSAO_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_dt_vcto as DT_VENCIMENTO_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_valor as VL_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_vlr_multa as VL_MULTA,   
        cnv.cnv_nome as DS_CONVENIO,   
        emp.emp_nome_fantasia as DS_EMPRESA_CONVENIO,   
		emp.emp_cgc AS CONV_CNPJ, 
        nfs.nfs_vlr_iss as VL_ISS,   
        nfs.nfs_vlr_ir as VL_IR,   
        cfg.cfg_vlrfilme as VL_FILME,   
        nfs.nfs_perc_iss as VL_PERC_ISS,   
        nfs.nfs_perc_ir as VL_PER_IR,   
        nfs.nfs_perc_multa as VL_PERC_MULTA,   
        nfs.nfs_perc_juro as VL_PERC_JURO,   
        nfs.nfs_vlr_outros_imp as VL_OUTROS_IMP,
		nfs.nfs_remessa as NR_REMESSA,
		cfg.cfg_emp as MARCA,
		cfg.cfg_emp as DS_UNIDADE,
        cfg.cfg_cgc as CNPJ,
        'SMART INOB' AS BASE,
        GETDATE() AS DT_CARGA 
     FROM cnv,   
         emp,   
         nfs,   
         cfg,   
			mte, 
			rdi,
			pac   
   WHERE ( emp.emp_cod = nfs.nfs_emp_cod ) and  
         ( cnv.cnv_cod = nfs.nfs_emp_codigo ) and  
         ( nfs.nfs_tipo = 'NC' ) AND 
		 ( rdi.rdi_vcto >= GETDATE() - 100 ) AND  
         ( rdi.rdi_vcto < GETDATE() ) AND
		 ( rdi.rdi_forma_pag <> 'U' ) AND 
		 ( rdi.rdi_recepcao <> 'S' ) AND 
		 ( nfs.nfs_status = 'P' ) AND 
		 ( mte.mte_pac_reg = pac.pac_reg ) AND 
		 ( mte.mte_nfs_tipo = nfs.nfs_tipo ) AND
		 ( mte.mte_nfs_serie = nfs.nfs_serie ) AND
		 ( mte.mte_nfs_numero = nfs.nfs_numero ) AND
		 ( mte.mte_status = 'D' ) AND 
		 ( mte.mte_tipo not in ( 'E', 'D' ) ) AND
		 ( mte.mte_serie = rdi.rdi_mte_serie ) AND
		 ( mte.mte_seq = rdi.rdi_mte_seq ) AND
		 ( ( mte.mte_tipo <> 'C' ) OR
			  ( EXISTS ( SELECT tca_cod FROM tca
								WHERE ( tca.tca_cod = mte.mte_tca_cod ) AND
										( tca.tca_ind_cr = 'S' ) ) ) OR 
			  ( EXISTS ( SELECT udp_valor FROM udp 
								WHERE ( udp.udp_mte_serie_dep = mte.mte_serie ) AND
										( udp.udp_mte_seq_dep = mte.mte_seq ) ) ) ) AND 
			( ( rdi.rdi_mcc_serie_dep is null ) OR 
			  ( rdi.rdi_forma_pag = 'X' ) OR 
			  ( rdi.rdi_seq_subst is null AND 
				 NOT EXISTS ( SELECT mns.mns_serie FROM mns
									WHERE ( rdi.rdi_mns_serie = mns.mns_serie ) AND
											( rdi.rdi_mns_num = mns.mns_num ) AND
											( mns.mns_ind_liberado = 'S' ) ) ) ) 
 ------- OK 4
UNION ALL 

  SELECT  top 10 
        nfs.nfs_tipo as NR_TIPO_TITULO, 
        nfs.nfs_serie as NR_SERIE_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_numero as NR_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_dt_emis as DT_EMISSAO_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_dt_vcto as DT_VENCIMENTO_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_valor as VL_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_vlr_multa as VL_MULTA,   
        cnv.cnv_nome as DS_CONVENIO,   
        emp.emp_nome_fantasia as DS_EMPRESA_CONVENIO,   
		emp.emp_cgc AS CONV_CNPJ, 
        nfs.nfs_vlr_iss as VL_ISS,   
        nfs.nfs_vlr_ir as VL_IR,   
        cfg.cfg_vlrfilme as VL_FILME,   
        nfs.nfs_perc_iss as VL_PERC_ISS,   
        nfs.nfs_perc_ir as VL_PER_IR,   
        nfs.nfs_perc_multa as VL_PERC_MULTA,   
        nfs.nfs_perc_juro as VL_PERC_JURO,   
        nfs.nfs_vlr_outros_imp as VL_OUTROS_IMP,
		nfs.nfs_remessa as NR_REMESSA,
		cfg.cfg_emp as MARCA,
		cfg.cfg_emp as DS_UNIDADE,
        cfg.cfg_cgc as CNPJ,
        'SMART INOB' AS BASE,
        GETDATE() AS DT_CARGA  
     FROM cnv,   
         emp,   
         nfs,   
         cfg,   
         MNS,
			mte, 
			rdi,
			pac, 
			rdi b   
   WHERE ( emp.emp_cod = nfs.nfs_emp_cod ) and  
         ( MNS.MNS_NFS_SERIE = nfs.nfs_serie) and  
         ( MNS.MNS_NFS_NUMERO = nfs.nfs_numero) and  
         ( MNS.MNS_NFS_TIPO = nfs.nfs_tipo) and  
         ( cnv.cnv_cod = nfs.nfs_emp_codigo ) and  
         ( nfs.nfs_tipo = 'NC' ) AND 
		 ( rdi.rdi_vcto >= GETDATE()-100 ) AND  
         ( rdi.rdi_vcto < GETDATE() ) AND
		 ( rdi.rdi_forma_pag <> 'U' ) AND 
		 ( rdi.rdi_recepcao <> 'S' ) AND 
		 ( mns.mns_mns_serie is null ) AND
		 ( mns.mns_ind_liberado = 'S' ) AND 
		 ( nfs.nfs_status = 'P' ) AND 
		 ( mte.mte_pac_reg = pac.pac_reg ) AND 
		 ( mte.mte_nfs_tipo = nfs.nfs_tipo ) AND
		 ( mte.mte_nfs_serie = nfs.nfs_serie ) AND
		 ( mte.mte_nfs_numero = nfs.nfs_numero ) AND
		 ( mte.mte_status = 'D' ) AND 
		 ( mte.mte_tipo not in ( 'E', 'D' ) ) AND
		 ( 8=8 ) AND 
		 ( mte.mte_serie = rdi.rdi_mte_serie ) AND
		 ( mte.mte_seq = rdi.rdi_mte_seq ) AND
		 ( b.rdi_mte_serie = rdi.rdi_mte_serie ) AND
		 ( b.rdi_mte_seq = rdi.rdi_mte_seq ) AND
		 ( b.rdi_seq = rdi.rdi_seq_subst ) AND 
		 ( b.rdi_mns_serie = mns.mns_serie ) AND
		 ( b.rdi_mns_num = mns.mns_num ) AND 
		 ( rdi.rdi_mcc_serie_dep is not null ) AND 
		 ( ( mte.mte_tipo <> 'C' ) OR
		   ( EXISTS ( SELECT tca_cod FROM tca
		 					WHERE ( tca.tca_cod = mte.mte_tca_cod ) AND
										( tca.tca_ind_cr = 'S' ) ) ) OR 
			  ( EXISTS ( SELECT udp_valor FROM udp 
								WHERE ( udp.udp_mte_serie_dep = mte.mte_serie ) AND
										( udp.udp_mte_seq_dep = mte.mte_seq ) ) ) )

SELECT  top 100
  nfs.nfs_tipo  as NR_TIPO_TITULO,
  cfg.cfg_cgc as CNPJ,

  nfs.nfs_serie as NR_SERIE_TITULO,   
  nfs.nfs_numero as NR_TITULO,  
  MNS_DT as DT_RECEBIMENTO,
  MNS_VLR AS VL_RECEBIDO,
  0.00 AS VL_DESCONTOS,
  0.00 AS VL_JUROS, 
  NFS_VLR_MULTA AS VL_MULTA,
  MNS_DT AS DT_ATUALIZACAO,
  MNS_TIPO AS DS_TIPO_RECEBIMENTO,
  ' ' AS DS_TRANSACAO,
   'SMART INOB' AS BASE,
    GETDATE() AS DT_CARGA  
   FROM mns ,           
   cfg ,           
   nfs  
   WHERE ( nfs.nfs_serie = mns.mns_nfs_serie ) 
   and ( nfs.nfs_numero = mns.mns_nfs_numero ) 
   and ( nfs.nfs_tipo = mns.mns_nfs_tipo ) 
   and ( mns.mns_mns_serie is null )

properties.description:
Pipeline desenvolvido para alimentar as tableas:

Titulos_receber e Baixa_Titulos_Receber

Iniciado conferencia pelo setor de Contas a Receber das informações alimentadas por Tasy e Smart.

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT 
        nfs.nfs_tipo as NR_TIPO_TITULO, 
        nfs.nfs_serie as NR_SERIE_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_numero as NR_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_dt_emis as DT_EMISSAO_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_dt_vcto as DT_VENCIMENTO_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_valor as VL_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_vlr_multa as VL_MULTA,   
        cnv.cnv_nome as DS_CONVENIO,   
        emp.emp_nome_fantasia as DS_EMPRESA_CONVENIO,   
		emp.emp_cgc AS CONV_CNPJ, 
        nfs.nfs_vlr_iss as VL_ISS,   
        nfs.nfs_vlr_ir as VL_IR,   
        cfg.cfg_vlrfilme as VL_FILME,   
        nfs.nfs_perc_iss as VL_PERC_ISS,   
        nfs.nfs_perc_ir as VL_PER_IR,   
        nfs.nfs_perc_multa as VL_PERC_MULTA,   
        nfs.nfs_perc_juro as VL_PERC_JURO,   
        nfs.nfs_vlr_outros_imp as VL_OUTROS_IMP,
		nfs.nfs_remessa as NR_REMESSA,
		cfg.cfg_emp as MARCA,
		cfg.cfg_emp as DS_UNIDADE,
        cfg.cfg_cgc as CNPJ,
        'SMART IOF' AS BASE,
        GETDATE() AS DT_CARGA 
     FROM cnv,   
         emp,   
         nfs,   
         cfg,   
         MNS 
LEFT JOIN (SELECT  
       mns.mns_serie as serie, 
       mns.mns_num as numero, 
       mns.mns_nfs_serie as nfs_serie,
       mns.mns_nfs_numero as nfs_numero,
       mns.mns_nfs_tipo as nfs_tipo,    
       (SELECT sum ( m2.mns_vlr ) 
        	FROM mns m2, nfs 
			WHERE  ( m2.mns_mns_serie = mns.mns_serie ) AND 
					( m2.mns_mns_num = mns.mns_num ) AND 
               ( m2.mns_nfs_serie = nfs.nfs_serie ) AND
               ( m2.mns_nfs_numero = nfs.nfs_numero ) AND
               ( m2.mns_nfs_tipo = nfs.nfs_tipo )) AS imposto
			FROM   cnv, 
					 emp, 
					 nfs, 
					 cfg, 
					 mns 
			 WHERE ( emp.emp_cod = nfs.nfs_emp_cod) and  
				( MNS.MNS_NFS_SERIE = nfs.nfs_serie) and  
				( MNS.MNS_NFS_NUMERO = nfs.nfs_numero) and  
				( MNS.MNS_NFS_TIPO = nfs.nfs_tipo) and  
				( cnv.cnv_cod = nfs.nfs_emp_codigo ) and  
				( nfs.nfs_tipo <> 'NC' ) AND 
				( nfs.nfs_dt_vcto >= GETDATE() - 100) AND  
				( nfs.nfs_dt_vcto < GETDATE() ) AND
				( mns.mns_mns_serie is null ) AND
				( mns.mns_ind_liberado = 'S' ) AND 
				( nfs.nfs_status = 'P' ) AND 
				( 8=8 ) AND 
				NOT EXISTS ( SELECT mte.mte_serie FROM mte
									WHERE ( mte.mte_nfs_tipo = nfs.nfs_tipo ) AND
											( mte.mte_nfs_serie = nfs.nfs_serie ) AND
											( mte.mte_nfs_numero = nfs.nfs_numero ) AND
											( mte.mte_tipo in ( 'C', 'E', 'O', 'D' ) ) )
			GROUP  BY   mns.mns_serie , 
					 mns.mns_num , 
					 mns.mns_nfs_serie ,
					 mns.mns_nfs_numero ,
					 mns.mns_nfs_tipo  

) m ON m.serie = mns.mns_serie and m.numero = mns.mns_num and m.nfs_serie = mns.mns_nfs_serie and m.nfs_numero = mns.mns_nfs_numero and m.nfs_tipo = mns.mns_nfs_tipo

   WHERE ( emp.emp_cod = nfs.nfs_emp_cod) and  
         ( MNS.MNS_NFS_SERIE = nfs.nfs_serie) and  
         ( MNS.MNS_NFS_NUMERO = nfs.nfs_numero) and  
         ( MNS.MNS_NFS_TIPO = nfs.nfs_tipo) and  
         ( cnv.cnv_cod = nfs.nfs_emp_codigo ) and  
         ( nfs.nfs_tipo <> 'NC' ) AND 
			( nfs.nfs_dt_vcto >= GETDATE() - 100 ) AND  
         ( nfs.nfs_dt_vcto < GETDATE() ) AND
			( mns.mns_mns_serie is null ) AND
			( mns.mns_ind_liberado = 'S' ) AND 
			( nfs.nfs_status = 'P' ) AND 
			( 8=8 ) AND 
			NOT EXISTS ( SELECT mte.mte_serie FROM mte
								WHERE ( mte.mte_nfs_tipo = nfs.nfs_tipo ) AND
										( mte.mte_nfs_serie = nfs.nfs_serie ) AND
										( mte.mte_nfs_numero = nfs.nfs_numero ) AND
										( mte.mte_tipo in ( 'C', 'E', 'O', 'D' ) ) ) 
GROUP BY nfs.nfs_tipo,   
         nfs.nfs_serie,   
         nfs.nfs_numero,   
         nfs.nfs_dt_emis,   
         nfs.nfs_dt_vcto,   
         nfs.nfs_valor,   
         nfs.nfs_vlr_multa,   
         cnv.cnv_nome,   
         emp.emp_nome_fantasia,   
         nfs.nfs_emp_codigo,   
         nfs.nfs_emp_cod,   
         nfs.nfs_vlr_iss,   
         cfg.cfg_emp,   
         cnv.cnv_ccr_banco,    
         cfg.cfg_vlrfilme,   
         nfs.nfs_perc_iss,   
         nfs.nfs_perc_ir,   
         nfs.nfs_perc_multa,   
         nfs.nfs_remessa,   
         cfg.cfg_tol_ent_diaria,   
         nfs.nfs_perc_juro,   
         nfs.nfs_vlr_outros_imp,   
         MNS.MNS_DT,   
         MNS.MNS_TIPO, 
		 MNS.MNS_NFS_TIPO, 
		 mns.mns_mns_serie, 
		 mns.mns_mns_num, 
		 mns.mns_serie, 
		 mns.mns_num, 
		 cfg.cfg_vlrfilme, 
		 nfs.nfs_nde_tipo, 
		 nfs.nfs_vlr_ir, 
		 mns.mns_obs,
		 nfs.nfs_ind_tipo_fatura,
		 nfs.nfs_nfl_serie, 
		 nfs.nfs_nfl_num,
		 mns.mns_nfl_serie,
		 mns.mns_nfl_num,
		 nfs.nfs_dt_receb,
		 cfg.cfg_vlrfilme,
		 nfs.nfs_dt_envio,
		 nfs.nfs_ns_serie, 
		 nfs.nfs_ns_numero, 	
		 cnv.cnv_caixa_fatura,
         cfg.cfg_cgc,
		 emp.emp_cgc 

UNION ALL   

  SELECT top 10 
        nfs.nfs_tipo as NR_TIPO_TITULO, 
        nfs.nfs_serie as NR_SERIE_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_numero as NR_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_dt_emis as DT_EMISSAO_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_dt_vcto as DT_VENCIMENTO_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_valor as VL_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_vlr_multa as VL_MULTA,   
        cnv.cnv_nome as DS_CONVENIO,   
        emp.emp_nome_fantasia as DS_EMPRESA_CONVENIO,   
		emp.emp_cgc AS CONV_CNPJ, 
        nfs.nfs_vlr_iss as VL_ISS,   
        nfs.nfs_vlr_ir as VL_IR,   
        cfg.cfg_vlrfilme as VL_FILME,   
        nfs.nfs_perc_iss as VL_PERC_ISS,   
        nfs.nfs_perc_ir as VL_PER_IR,   
        nfs.nfs_perc_multa as VL_PERC_MULTA,   
        nfs.nfs_perc_juro as VL_PERC_JURO,   
        nfs.nfs_vlr_outros_imp as VL_OUTROS_IMP,
		nfs.nfs_remessa as NR_REMESSA,
		cfg.cfg_emp as MARCA,
		cfg.cfg_emp as DS_UNIDADE,
        cfg.cfg_cgc as CNPJ,
        'SMART IOF' AS BASE,
        GETDATE() AS DT_CARGA 
    FROM cnv,   
         emp,   
         nfs,   
         cfg,   
         MNS, 
			nfs b  
   WHERE ( emp.emp_cod = nfs.nfs_emp_cod) and  
			( MNS.MNS_NFS_SERIE = b.nfs_serie) and  
         ( MNS.MNS_NFS_NUMERO = b.nfs_numero) and  
         ( MNS.MNS_NFS_TIPO = b.nfs_tipo) and  
         ( nfs.NFS_SERIE = b.nfs_ns_serie ) and  
         ( nfs.NFS_NUMERO = b.nfs_ns_numero ) and  
         ( nfs.NFS_TIPO = b.nfs_ns_tipo) and  
         ( cnv.cnv_cod = nfs.nfs_emp_codigo ) and  
         ( nfs.nfs_tipo <> 'NC' ) AND 
			--( nfs.nfs_tipo in ( :a_sNfsTipos ) ) AND
			( nfs.nfs_dt_vcto >= GETDATE() - 100 ) AND  
         ( nfs.nfs_dt_vcto < GETDATE() ) AND
			( mns.mns_mns_serie is null ) AND
			( mns.mns_ind_liberado = 'S' ) AND 
			( nfs.nfs_status = 'P' ) AND 
			( 8=8 ) AND 	
			NOT EXISTS ( SELECT mte.mte_serie FROM mte
								WHERE ( mte.mte_nfs_tipo = nfs.nfs_tipo ) AND
										( mte.mte_nfs_serie = nfs.nfs_serie ) AND
										( mte.mte_nfs_numero = nfs.nfs_numero ) AND
										( mte.mte_tipo in ( 'C', 'E', 'O', 'D' ) ) )
GROUP BY nfs.nfs_tipo,   
         nfs.nfs_serie,   
         nfs.nfs_numero,   
         nfs.nfs_dt_emis,   
         nfs.nfs_dt_vcto,   
         nfs.nfs_valor,   
         nfs.nfs_vlr_multa,   
         cnv.cnv_nome,   
         emp.emp_nome_fantasia,   
         nfs.nfs_emp_codigo,   
         nfs.nfs_emp_cod,   
         nfs.nfs_vlr_iss,   
         cfg.cfg_emp,   
         cnv.cnv_ccr_banco,   
         nfs.nfs_vlr_ir,   
         cfg.cfg_vlrfilme,   
         nfs.nfs_perc_iss,   
         nfs.nfs_perc_ir,   
         nfs.nfs_perc_multa,   
         nfs.nfs_remessa,   
         cfg.cfg_tol_ent_diaria,   
         nfs.nfs_perc_juro,   
         nfs.nfs_vlr_outros_imp,   
         CASE WHEN mns.mns_tipo = 'NR' THEN b.nfs_dt_vcto ELSE MNS.MNS_DT END,   
         MNS.MNS_TIPO, 
		 MNS.MNS_NFS_TIPO, 
		 mns.mns_mns_serie, 
		 mns.mns_mns_num, 
		 mns.mns_serie, 
		 mns.mns_num, 
		 b.nfs_nde_tipo, 
		 nfs.nfs_vlr_ir, 
		 mns.mns_obs, 
		 nfs.nfs_ind_tipo_fatura,
		 nfs.nfs_nfl_serie, 
		 nfs.nfs_nfl_num, 
		 mns.mns_nfl_serie,
		 mns.mns_nfl_num,
		 nfs.nfs_dt_receb,
		 nfs.nfs_dt_envio,
		 nfs.nfs_ns_serie, 
		 nfs.nfs_ns_numero, 	
		 cnv.cnv_caixa_fatura,
         cfg.cfg_cgc,
		 emp.emp_cgc

UNION ALL 

  SELECT top 10 
        nfs.nfs_tipo as NR_TIPO_TITULO, 
        nfs.nfs_serie as NR_SERIE_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_numero as NR_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_dt_emis as DT_EMISSAO_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_dt_vcto as DT_VENCIMENTO_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_valor as VL_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_vlr_multa as VL_MULTA,   
        cnv.cnv_nome as DS_CONVENIO,   
        emp.emp_nome_fantasia as DS_EMPRESA_CONVENIO,   
		emp.emp_cgc AS CONV_CNPJ, 
        nfs.nfs_vlr_iss as VL_ISS,   
        nfs.nfs_vlr_ir as VL_IR,   
        cfg.cfg_vlrfilme as VL_FILME,

		nfs.nfs_remessa as NR_REMESSA,
		cfg.cfg_emp as MARCA,
		cfg.cfg_emp as DS_UNIDADE,
        cfg.cfg_cgc as CNPJ,
        'SMART IOF' AS BASE,
        GETDATE() AS DT_CARGA     
    FROM cnv,   
         emp,   
         nfs,   
         cfg  
   WHERE ( emp.emp_cod = nfs.nfs_emp_cod) and  
         ( cnv.cnv_cod = nfs.nfs_emp_codigo ) and  
         ( nfs.nfs_dt_vcto >= GETDATE()  - 100) AND  
         ( nfs.nfs_dt_vcto < GETDATE() ) AND  
         ( nfs.nfs_tipo <> 'NC' ) AND
			( nfs.nfs_status = 'P' ) AND 
			--( nfs.nfs_tipo in ( :a_sNfsTipos ) ) AND 
			NOT EXISTS ( SELECT mte.mte_serie FROM mte
								WHERE ( mte.mte_nfs_tipo = nfs.nfs_tipo ) AND
										( mte.mte_nfs_serie = nfs.nfs_serie ) AND
										( mte.mte_nfs_numero = nfs.nfs_numero ) AND
										( mte.mte_tipo in ( 'C', 'E', 'O', 'D' ) ) ) AND
			NOT EXISTS ( SELECT MNS.MNS_NUM FROM MNS 
								WHERE ( mns.mns_ind_liberado = 'S' ) AND 
										( 8=8 ) AND 
										( MNS.MNS_NFS_SERIE = nfs.nfs_serie) and  
							         ( MNS.MNS_NFS_NUMERO = nfs.nfs_numero) and  
							         ( MNS.MNS_NFS_TIPO = nfs.nfs_tipo) ) 
 -------------- OK  2
UNION ALL 

  SELECT top 10 
        nfs.nfs_tipo as NR_TIPO_TITULO, 
        nfs.nfs_serie as NR_SERIE_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_numero as NR_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_dt_emis as DT_EMISSAO_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_dt_vcto as DT_VENCIMENTO_TITULO,

		cfg.cfg_emp as DS_UNIDADE,
        cfg.cfg_cgc as CNPJ,
        'SMART IOF' AS BASE,
        GETDATE() AS DT_CARGA  
     FROM cnv,   
         emp,   
         nfs,

         MNS,
			mte, 
			rdi,
			pac   
   WHERE ( emp.emp_cod = nfs.nfs_emp_cod ) and  
         ( MNS.MNS_NFS_SERIE = nfs.nfs_serie) and  
         ( MNS.MNS_NFS_NUMERO = nfs.nfs_numero) and  
         ( MNS.MNS_NFS_TIPO = nfs.nfs_tipo) and  
         ( cnv.cnv_cod = nfs.nfs_emp_codigo ) and  
         ( nfs.nfs_tipo = 'NC' ) AND 
			--( nfs.nfs_tipo in ( :a_sNfsTipos ) ) AND
		 ( rdi.rdi_vcto >= GETDATE() - 100 ) AND  
         ( rdi.rdi_vcto < GETDATE() ) AND
		 ( rdi.rdi_forma_pag <> 'U' ) AND 
		 ( rdi.rdi_recepcao <> 'S' ) AND 
		 ( mns.mns_mns_serie is null ) AND
		 ( mns.mns_ind_liberado = 'S' ) AND 
		 ( nfs.nfs_status = 'P' ) AND 
		 ( mte.mte_pac_reg = pac.pac_reg ) AND 
		 ( mte.mte_nfs_tipo = nfs.nfs_tipo ) AND
		 ( mte.mte_nfs_serie = nfs.nfs_serie ) AND
		 ( mte.mte_nfs_numero = nfs.nfs_numero ) AND
		 ( mte.mte_status = 'D' ) AND 
		 ( mte.mte_tipo not in ( 'E', 'D' ) ) AND
		 ( 8=8 ) AND 
		 ( mte.mte_serie = rdi.rdi_mte_serie ) AND
		 ( mte.mte_seq = rdi.rdi_mte_seq ) AND
		 ( rdi.rdi_mns_serie = mns.mns_serie ) AND
		 ( rdi.rdi_mns_num = mns.mns_num ) AND 
		 ( rdi.rdi_mcc_serie_dep is not null ) AND 
		 ( ( mte.mte_tipo <> 'C' ) OR
			  ( EXISTS ( SELECT tca_cod FROM tca
								WHERE ( tca.tca_cod = mte.mte_tca_cod ) AND
										( tca.tca_ind_cr = 'S' ) ) ) OR 
			  ( EXISTS ( SELECT udp_valor FROM udp 
								WHERE ( udp.udp_mte_serie_dep = mte.mte_serie ) AND
										( udp.udp_mte_seq_dep = mte.mte_seq ) ) ) ) 

---- OK 3

UNION ALL 

  SELECT  top 10

        cnv.cnv_nome as DS_CONVENIO,

        nfs.nfs_vlr_outros_imp as VL_OUTROS_IMP,
		nfs.nfs_remessa as NR_REMESSA,
		cfg.cfg_emp as MARCA,
		cfg.cfg_emp as DS_UNIDADE,
        cfg.cfg_cgc as CNPJ,
        'SMART IOF' AS BASE,
        GETDATE() AS DT_CARGA 
     FROM cnv,   
         emp,   
         nfs,   
         cfg,   
			mte, 
			rdi,
			pac   
   WHERE ( emp.emp_cod = nfs.nfs_emp_cod ) and  
         ( cnv.cnv_cod = nfs.nfs_emp_codigo ) and  
         ( nfs.nfs_tipo = 'NC' ) AND 
		 ( rdi.rdi_vcto >= GETDATE() - 100 ) AND  
         ( rdi.rdi_vcto < GETDATE() ) AND
		 ( rdi.rdi_forma_pag <> 'U' ) AND 
		 ( rdi.rdi_recepcao <> 'S' ) AND 
		 ( nfs.nfs_status = 'P' ) AND 
		 ( mte.mte_pac_reg = pac.pac_reg ) AND 
		 ( mte.mte_nfs_tipo = nfs.nfs_tipo ) AND
		 ( mte.mte_nfs_serie = nfs.nfs_serie ) AND
		 ( mte.mte_nfs_numero = nfs.nfs_numero ) AND
		 ( mte.mte_status = 'D' ) AND 
		 ( mte.mte_tipo not in ( 'E', 'D' ) ) AND
		 ( mte.mte_serie = rdi.rdi_mte_serie ) AND
		 ( mte.mte_seq = rdi.rdi_mte_seq ) AND
		 ( ( mte.mte_tipo <> 'C' ) OR
			  ( EXISTS ( SELECT tca_cod FROM tca
								WHERE ( tca.tca_cod = mte.mte_tca_cod ) AND
										( tca.tca_ind_cr = 'S' ) ) ) OR 
			  ( EXISTS ( SELECT udp_valor FROM udp 
								WHERE ( udp.udp_mte_serie_dep = mte.mte_serie ) AND
										( udp.udp_mte_seq_dep = mte.mte_seq ) ) ) ) AND 
			( ( rdi.rdi_mcc_serie_dep is null ) OR 
			  ( rdi.rdi_forma_pag = 'X' ) OR 
			  ( rdi.rdi_seq_subst is null AND 
				 NOT EXISTS ( SELECT mns.mns_serie FROM mns
									WHERE ( rdi.rdi_mns_serie = mns.mns_serie ) AND
											( rdi.rdi_mns_num = mns.mns_num ) AND
											( mns.mns_ind_liberado = 'S' ) ) ) ) 
 ------- OK 4
UNION ALL 

  SELECT  top 10 
        nfs.nfs_tipo as NR_TIPO_TITULO,

        nfs.nfs_dt_emis as DT_EMISSAO_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_dt_vcto as DT_VENCIMENTO_TITULO,

        cnv.cnv_nome as DS_CONVENIO,   
        emp.emp_nome_fantasia as DS_EMPRESA_CONVENIO,   
		emp.emp_cgc AS CONV_CNPJ, 
        nfs.nfs_vlr_iss as VL_ISS,   
        nfs.nfs_vlr_ir as VL_IR,   
        cfg.cfg_vlrfilme as VL_FILME,   
        nfs.nfs_perc_iss as VL_PERC_ISS,   
        nfs.nfs_perc_ir as VL_PER_IR,   
        nfs.nfs_perc_multa as VL_PERC_MULTA,   
        nfs.nfs_perc_juro as VL_PERC_JURO,   
        nfs.nfs_vlr_outros_imp as VL_OUTROS_IMP,
		nfs.nfs_remessa as NR_REMESSA,
		cfg.cfg_emp as MARCA,
		cfg.cfg_emp as DS_UNIDADE,
        cfg.cfg_cgc as CNPJ,
        'SMART IOF' AS BASE,
        GETDATE() AS DT_CARGA  
     FROM cnv,   
         emp,   
         nfs,   
         cfg,   
         MNS,
			mte, 
			rdi,
			pac, 
			rdi b   
   WHERE ( emp.emp_cod = nfs.nfs_emp_cod ) and  
         ( MNS.MNS_NFS_SERIE = nfs.nfs_serie) and  
         ( MNS.MNS_NFS_NUMERO = nfs.nfs_numero) and  
         ( MNS.MNS_NFS_TIPO = nfs.nfs_tipo) and  
         ( cnv.cnv_cod = nfs.nfs_emp_codigo ) and  
         ( nfs.nfs_tipo = 'NC' ) AND 
		 ( rdi.rdi_vcto >= GETDATE()-100 ) AND  
         ( rdi.rdi_vcto < GETDATE() ) AND
		 ( rdi.rdi_forma_pag <> 'U' ) AND 
		 ( rdi.rdi_recepcao <> 'S' ) AND 
		 ( mns.mns_mns_serie is null ) AND
		 ( mns.mns_ind_liberado = 'S' ) AND 
		 ( nfs.nfs_status = 'P' ) AND 
		 ( mte.mte_pac_reg = pac.pac_reg ) AND 
		 ( mte.mte_nfs_tipo = nfs.nfs_tipo ) AND
		 ( mte.mte_nfs_serie = nfs.nfs_serie ) AND
		 ( mte.mte_nfs_numero = nfs.nfs_numero ) AND
		 ( mte.mte_status = 'D' ) AND 
		 ( mte.mte_tipo not in ( 'E', 'D' ) ) AND
		 ( 8=8 ) AND 
		 ( mte.mte_serie = rdi.rdi_mte_serie ) AND
		 ( mte.mte_seq = rdi.rdi_mte_seq ) AND
		 ( b.rdi_mte_serie = rdi.rdi_mte_serie ) AND
		 ( b.rdi_mte_seq = rdi.rdi_mte_seq ) AND
		 ( b.rdi_seq = rdi.rdi_seq_subst ) AND 
		 ( b.rdi_mns_serie = mns.mns_serie ) AND
		 ( b.rdi_mns_num = mns.mns_num ) AND 
		 ( rdi.rdi_mcc_serie_dep is not null ) AND 
		 ( ( mte.mte_tipo <> 'C' ) OR
		   ( EXISTS ( SELECT tca_cod FROM tca
		 					WHERE ( tca.tca_cod = mte.mte_tca_cod ) AND
										( tca.tca_ind_cr = 'S' ) ) ) OR 
			  ( EXISTS ( SELECT udp_valor FROM udp 
								WHERE ( udp.udp_mte_serie_dep = mte.mte_serie ) AND
										( udp.udp_mte_seq_dep = mte.mte_seq ) ) ) )

SELECT  top 100
  nfs.nfs_tipo  as NR_TIPO_TITULO,
  cfg.cfg_cgc as CNPJ,

  nfs.nfs_serie as NR_SERIE_TITULO,   
  nfs.nfs_numero as NR_TITULO,  
  MNS_DT as DT_RECEBIMENTO,
  MNS_VLR AS VL_RECEBIDO,
  0.00 AS VL_DESCONTOS,
  0.00 AS VL_JUROS, 
  NFS_VLR_MULTA AS VL_MULTA,
  MNS_DT AS DT_ATUALIZACAO,
  MNS_TIPO AS DS_TIPO_RECEBIMENTO,
  ' ' AS DS_TRANSACAO,
   'SMART IOF' AS BASE,
    GETDATE() AS DT_CARGA 
   FROM mns ,           
   cfg ,           
   nfs  
   WHERE ( nfs.nfs_serie = mns.mns_nfs_serie ) 
   and ( nfs.nfs_numero = mns.mns_nfs_numero ) 
   and ( nfs.nfs_tipo = mns.mns_nfs_tipo ) 
   and ( mns.mns_mns_serie is null )

properties.description:
Pipeline desenvolvido para alimentar as tableas:

Titulos_receber e Baixa_Titulos_Receber

Iniciado conferencia pelo setor de Contas a Receber das informações alimentadas por Tasy e Smart.

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT 
        nfs.nfs_tipo as NR_TIPO_TITULO, 
        nfs.nfs_serie as NR_SERIE_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_numero as NR_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_dt_emis as DT_EMISSAO_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_dt_vcto as DT_VENCIMENTO_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_valor as VL_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_vlr_multa as VL_MULTA,   
        cnv.cnv_nome as DS_CONVENIO,   
        emp.emp_nome_fantasia as DS_EMPRESA_CONVENIO,   
		emp.emp_cgc AS CONV_CNPJ, 
        nfs.nfs_vlr_iss as VL_ISS,   
        nfs.nfs_vlr_ir as VL_IR,   
        cfg.cfg_vlrfilme as VL_FILME,   
        nfs.nfs_perc_iss as VL_PERC_ISS,   
        nfs.nfs_perc_ir as VL_PER_IR,   
        nfs.nfs_perc_multa as VL_PERC_MULTA,   
        nfs.nfs_perc_juro as VL_PERC_JURO,   
        nfs.nfs_vlr_outros_imp as VL_OUTROS_IMP,
		nfs.nfs_remessa as NR_REMESSA,
		cfg.cfg_emp as MARCA,
		cfg.cfg_emp as DS_UNIDADE,
        cfg.cfg_cgc as CNPJ,
        'SMART Itabuna' AS BASE,
        GETDATE() AS DT_CARGA 
     FROM cnv,   
         emp,   
         nfs,   
         cfg,   
         MNS 
LEFT JOIN (SELECT  
       mns.mns_serie as serie, 
       mns.mns_num as numero, 
       mns.mns_nfs_serie as nfs_serie,
       mns.mns_nfs_numero as nfs_numero,
       mns.mns_nfs_tipo as nfs_tipo,    
       (SELECT sum ( m2.mns_vlr ) 
        	FROM mns m2, nfs 
			WHERE  ( m2.mns_mns_serie = mns.mns_serie ) AND 
					( m2.mns_mns_num = mns.mns_num ) AND 
               ( m2.mns_nfs_serie = nfs.nfs_serie ) AND
               ( m2.mns_nfs_numero = nfs.nfs_numero ) AND
               ( m2.mns_nfs_tipo = nfs.nfs_tipo )) AS imposto
			FROM   cnv, 
					 emp, 
					 nfs, 
					 cfg, 
					 mns 
			 WHERE ( emp.emp_cod = nfs.nfs_emp_cod) and  
				( MNS.MNS_NFS_SERIE = nfs.nfs_serie) and  
				( MNS.MNS_NFS_NUMERO = nfs.nfs_numero) and  
				( MNS.MNS_NFS_TIPO = nfs.nfs_tipo) and  
				( cnv.cnv_cod = nfs.nfs_emp_codigo ) and  
				( nfs.nfs_tipo <> 'NC' ) AND 
				( nfs.nfs_dt_vcto >= GETDATE() - 100) AND  
				( nfs.nfs_dt_vcto < GETDATE() ) AND
				( mns.mns_mns_serie is null ) AND
				( mns.mns_ind_liberado = 'S' ) AND 
				( nfs.nfs_status = 'P' ) AND 
				( 8=8 ) AND 
				NOT EXISTS ( SELECT mte.mte_serie FROM mte
									WHERE ( mte.mte_nfs_tipo = nfs.nfs_tipo ) AND
											( mte.mte_nfs_serie = nfs.nfs_serie ) AND
											( mte.mte_nfs_numero = nfs.nfs_numero ) AND
											( mte.mte_tipo in ( 'C', 'E', 'O', 'D' ) ) )
			GROUP  BY   mns.mns_serie , 
					 mns.mns_num , 
					 mns.mns_nfs_serie ,
					 mns.mns_nfs_numero ,
					 mns.mns_nfs_tipo  

) m ON m.serie = mns.mns_serie and m.numero = mns.mns_num and m.nfs_serie = mns.mns_nfs_serie and m.nfs_numero = mns.mns_nfs_numero and m.nfs_tipo = mns.mns_nfs_tipo

   WHERE ( emp.emp_cod = nfs.nfs_emp_cod) and  
         ( MNS.MNS_NFS_SERIE = nfs.nfs_serie) and  
         ( MNS.MNS_NFS_NUMERO = nfs.nfs_numero) and  
         ( MNS.MNS_NFS_TIPO = nfs.nfs_tipo) and  
         ( cnv.cnv_cod = nfs.nfs_emp_codigo ) and  
         ( nfs.nfs_tipo <> 'NC' ) AND 
			( nfs.nfs_dt_vcto >= GETDATE() - 100 ) AND  
         ( nfs.nfs_dt_vcto < GETDATE() ) AND
			( mns.mns_mns_serie is null ) AND
			( mns.mns_ind_liberado = 'S' ) AND 
			( nfs.nfs_status = 'P' ) AND 
			( 8=8 ) AND 
			NOT EXISTS ( SELECT mte.mte_serie FROM mte
								WHERE ( mte.mte_nfs_tipo = nfs.nfs_tipo ) AND
										( mte.mte_nfs_serie = nfs.nfs_serie ) AND
										( mte.mte_nfs_numero = nfs.nfs_numero ) AND
										( mte.mte_tipo in ( 'C', 'E', 'O', 'D' ) ) ) 
GROUP BY nfs.nfs_tipo,   
         nfs.nfs_serie,   
         nfs.nfs_numero,   
         nfs.nfs_dt_emis,   
         nfs.nfs_dt_vcto,   
         nfs.nfs_valor,   
         nfs.nfs_vlr_multa,   
         cnv.cnv_nome,   
         emp.emp_nome_fantasia,   
         nfs.nfs_emp_codigo,   
         nfs.nfs_emp_cod,   
         nfs.nfs_vlr_iss,   
         cfg.cfg_emp,   
         cnv.cnv_ccr_banco,    
         cfg.cfg_vlrfilme,   
         nfs.nfs_perc_iss,   
         nfs.nfs_perc_ir,   
         nfs.nfs_perc_multa,   
         nfs.nfs_remessa,   
         cfg.cfg_tol_ent_diaria,   
         nfs.nfs_perc_juro,   
         nfs.nfs_vlr_outros_imp,   
         MNS.MNS_DT,   
         MNS.MNS_TIPO, 
		 MNS.MNS_NFS_TIPO, 
		 mns.mns_mns_serie, 
		 mns.mns_mns_num, 
		 mns.mns_serie, 
		 mns.mns_num, 
		 cfg.cfg_vlrfilme, 
		 nfs.nfs_nde_tipo, 
		 nfs.nfs_vlr_ir, 
		 mns.mns_obs,
		 nfs.nfs_ind_tipo_fatura,
		 nfs.nfs_nfl_serie, 
		 nfs.nfs_nfl_num,
		 mns.mns_nfl_serie,
		 mns.mns_nfl_num,
		 nfs.nfs_dt_receb,
		 cfg.cfg_vlrfilme,
		 nfs.nfs_dt_envio,
		 nfs.nfs_ns_serie, 
		 nfs.nfs_ns_numero, 	
		 cnv.cnv_caixa_fatura,
         cfg.cfg_cgc,
		 emp.emp_cgc 

UNION ALL   

  SELECT top 10 
        nfs.nfs_tipo as NR_TIPO_TITULO, 
        nfs.nfs_serie as NR_SERIE_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_numero as NR_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_dt_emis as DT_EMISSAO_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_dt_vcto as DT_VENCIMENTO_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_valor as VL_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_vlr_multa as VL_MULTA,   
        cnv.cnv_nome as DS_CONVENIO,   
        emp.emp_nome_fantasia as DS_EMPRESA_CONVENIO,   
		emp.emp_cgc AS CONV_CNPJ, 
        nfs.nfs_vlr_iss as VL_ISS,   
        nfs.nfs_vlr_ir as VL_IR,   
        cfg.cfg_vlrfilme as VL_FILME,   
        nfs.nfs_perc_iss as VL_PERC_ISS,   
        nfs.nfs_perc_ir as VL_PER_IR,   
        nfs.nfs_perc_multa as VL_PERC_MULTA,   
        nfs.nfs_perc_juro as VL_PERC_JURO,   
        nfs.nfs_vlr_outros_imp as VL_OUTROS_IMP,
		nfs.nfs_remessa as NR_REMESSA,
		cfg.cfg_emp as MARCA,
		cfg.cfg_emp as DS_UNIDADE,
        cfg.cfg_cgc as CNPJ,
        'SMART Itabuna' AS BASE,
        GETDATE() AS DT_CARGA 
    FROM cnv,   
         emp,   
         nfs,   
         cfg,   
         MNS, 
			nfs b  
   WHERE ( emp.emp_cod = nfs.nfs_emp_cod) and  
			( MNS.MNS_NFS_SERIE = b.nfs_serie) and  
         ( MNS.MNS_NFS_NUMERO = b.nfs_numero) and  
         ( MNS.MNS_NFS_TIPO = b.nfs_tipo) and  
         ( nfs.NFS_SERIE = b.nfs_ns_serie ) and  
         ( nfs.NFS_NUMERO = b.nfs_ns_numero ) and  
         ( nfs.NFS_TIPO = b.nfs_ns_tipo) and  
         ( cnv.cnv_cod = nfs.nfs_emp_codigo ) and  
         ( nfs.nfs_tipo <> 'NC' ) AND 
			--( nfs.nfs_tipo in ( :a_sNfsTipos ) ) AND
			( nfs.nfs_dt_vcto >= GETDATE() - 100 ) AND  
         ( nfs.nfs_dt_vcto < GETDATE() ) AND
			( mns.mns_mns_serie is null ) AND
			( mns.mns_ind_liberado = 'S' ) AND 
			( nfs.nfs_status = 'P' ) AND 
			( 8=8 ) AND 	
			NOT EXISTS ( SELECT mte.mte_serie FROM mte
								WHERE ( mte.mte_nfs_tipo = nfs.nfs_tipo ) AND
										( mte.mte_nfs_serie = nfs.nfs_serie ) AND
										( mte.mte_nfs_numero = nfs.nfs_numero ) AND
										( mte.mte_tipo in ( 'C', 'E', 'O', 'D' ) ) )
GROUP BY nfs.nfs_tipo,   
         nfs.nfs_serie,   
         nfs.nfs_numero,   
         nfs.nfs_dt_emis,   
         nfs.nfs_dt_vcto,   
         nfs.nfs_valor,   
         nfs.nfs_vlr_multa,   
         cnv.cnv_nome,   
         emp.emp_nome_fantasia,   
         nfs.nfs_emp_codigo,   
         nfs.nfs_emp_cod,   
         nfs.nfs_vlr_iss,   
         cfg.cfg_emp,   
         cnv.cnv_ccr_banco,   
         nfs.nfs_vlr_ir,   
         cfg.cfg_vlrfilme,   
         nfs.nfs_perc_iss,   
         nfs.nfs_perc_ir,   
         nfs.nfs_perc_multa,   
         nfs.nfs_remessa,   
         cfg.cfg_tol_ent_diaria,   
         nfs.nfs_perc_juro,   
         nfs.nfs_vlr_outros_imp,   
         CASE WHEN mns.mns_tipo = 'NR' THEN b.nfs_dt_vcto ELSE MNS.MNS_DT END,   
         MNS.MNS_TIPO, 
		 MNS.MNS_NFS_TIPO, 
		 mns.mns_mns_serie, 
		 mns.mns_mns_num, 
		 mns.mns_serie, 
		 mns.mns_num, 
		 b.nfs_nde_tipo, 
		 nfs.nfs_vlr_ir, 
		 mns.mns_obs, 
		 nfs.nfs_ind_tipo_fatura,
		 nfs.nfs_nfl_serie, 
		 nfs.nfs_nfl_num, 
		 mns.mns_nfl_serie,
		 mns.mns_nfl_num,
		 nfs.nfs_dt_receb,
		 nfs.nfs_dt_envio,
		 nfs.nfs_ns_serie, 
		 nfs.nfs_ns_numero, 	
		 cnv.cnv_caixa_fatura,
         cfg.cfg_cgc,
		 emp.emp_cgc

UNION ALL 

  SELECT top 10 
        nfs.nfs_tipo as NR_TIPO_TITULO, 
        nfs.nfs_serie as NR_SERIE_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_numero as NR_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_dt_emis as DT_EMISSAO_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_dt_vcto as DT_VENCIMENTO_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_valor as VL_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_vlr_multa as VL_MULTA,   
        cnv.cnv_nome as DS_CONVENIO,   
        emp.emp_nome_fantasia as DS_EMPRESA_CONVENIO,   
		emp.emp_cgc AS CONV_CNPJ, 
        nfs.nfs_vlr_iss as VL_ISS,   
        nfs.nfs_vlr_ir as VL_IR,   
        cfg.cfg_vlrfilme as VL_FILME,   
        nfs.nfs_perc_iss as VL_PERC_ISS,   
        nfs.nfs_perc_ir as VL_PER_IR,   
        nfs.nfs_perc_multa as VL_PERC_MULTA,   
        nfs.nfs_perc_juro as VL_PERC_JURO,   
        nfs.nfs_vlr_outros_imp as VL_OUTROS_IMP,
		nfs.nfs_remessa as NR_REMESSA,
		cfg.cfg_emp as MARCA,
		cfg.cfg_emp as DS_UNIDADE,
        cfg.cfg_cgc as CNPJ,
        'SMART Itabuna' AS BASE,
        GETDATE() AS DT_CARGA     
    FROM cnv,   
         emp,   
         nfs,   
         cfg  
   WHERE ( emp.emp_cod = nfs.nfs_emp_cod) and  
         ( cnv.cnv_cod = nfs.nfs_emp_codigo ) and  
         ( nfs.nfs_dt_vcto >= GETDATE()  - 100) AND  
         ( nfs.nfs_dt_vcto < GETDATE() ) AND  
         ( nfs.nfs_tipo <> 'NC' ) AND
			( nfs.nfs_status = 'P' ) AND 
			--( nfs.nfs_tipo in ( :a_sNfsTipos ) ) AND 
			NOT EXISTS ( SELECT mte.mte_serie FROM mte
								WHERE ( mte.mte_nfs_tipo = nfs.nfs_tipo ) AND
										( mte.mte_nfs_serie = nfs.nfs_serie ) AND
										( mte.mte_nfs_numero = nfs.nfs_numero ) AND
										( mte.mte_tipo in ( 'C', 'E', 'O', 'D' ) ) ) AND
			NOT EXISTS ( SELECT MNS.MNS_NUM FROM MNS 
								WHERE ( mns.mns_ind_liberado = 'S' ) AND 
										( 8=8 ) AND 
										( MNS.MNS_NFS_SERIE = nfs.nfs_serie) and  
							         ( MNS.MNS_NFS_NUMERO = nfs.nfs_numero) and  
							         ( MNS.MNS_NFS_TIPO = nfs.nfs_tipo) ) 
 -------------- OK  2
UNION ALL 

  SELECT top 10 
        nfs.nfs_tipo as NR_TIPO_TITULO, 
        nfs.nfs_serie as NR_SERIE_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_numero as NR_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_dt_emis as DT_EMISSAO_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_dt_vcto as DT_VENCIMENTO_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_valor as VL_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_vlr_multa as VL_MULTA,   
        cnv.cnv_nome as DS_CONVENIO,

		emp.emp_cgc AS CONV_CNPJ, 
        nfs.nfs_vlr_iss as VL_ISS,   
        nfs.nfs_vlr_ir as VL_IR,   
        cfg.cfg_vlrfilme as VL_FILME,   
        nfs.nfs_perc_iss as VL_PERC_ISS,   
        nfs.nfs_perc_ir as VL_PER_IR,

        nfs.nfs_perc_juro as VL_PERC_JURO,   
        nfs.nfs_vlr_outros_imp as VL_OUTROS_IMP,
		nfs.nfs_remessa as NR_REMESSA,
		cfg.cfg_emp as MARCA,
		cfg.cfg_emp as DS_UNIDADE,
        cfg.cfg_cgc as CNPJ,
        'SMART Itabuna' AS BASE,
        GETDATE() AS DT_CARGA  
     FROM cnv,   
         emp,   
         nfs,   
         cfg,   
         MNS,
			mte, 
			rdi,
			pac   
   WHERE ( emp.emp_cod = nfs.nfs_emp_cod ) and  
         ( MNS.MNS_NFS_SERIE = nfs.nfs_serie) and  
         ( MNS.MNS_NFS_NUMERO = nfs.nfs_numero) and  
         ( MNS.MNS_NFS_TIPO = nfs.nfs_tipo) and  
         ( cnv.cnv_cod = nfs.nfs_emp_codigo ) and  
         ( nfs.nfs_tipo = 'NC' ) AND 
			--( nfs.nfs_tipo in ( :a_sNfsTipos ) ) AND
		 ( rdi.rdi_vcto >= GETDATE() - 100 ) AND  
         ( rdi.rdi_vcto < GETDATE() ) AND
		 ( rdi.rdi_forma_pag <> 'U' ) AND 
		 ( rdi.rdi_recepcao <> 'S' ) AND 
		 ( mns.mns_mns_serie is null ) AND
		 ( mns.mns_ind_liberado = 'S' ) AND 
		 ( nfs.nfs_status = 'P' ) AND 
		 ( mte.mte_pac_reg = pac.pac_reg ) AND 
		 ( mte.mte_nfs_tipo = nfs.nfs_tipo ) AND
		 ( mte.mte_nfs_serie = nfs.nfs_serie ) AND
		 ( mte.mte_nfs_numero = nfs.nfs_numero ) AND
		 ( mte.mte_status = 'D' ) AND 
		 ( mte.mte_tipo not in ( 'E', 'D' ) ) AND
		 ( 8=8 ) AND 
		 ( mte.mte_serie = rdi.rdi_mte_serie ) AND
		 ( mte.mte_seq = rdi.rdi_mte_seq ) AND
		 ( rdi.rdi_mns_serie = mns.mns_serie ) AND
		 ( rdi.rdi_mns_num = mns.mns_num ) AND 
		 ( rdi.rdi_mcc_serie_dep is not null ) AND 
		 ( ( mte.mte_tipo <> 'C' ) OR
			  ( EXISTS ( SELECT tca_cod FROM tca
								WHERE ( tca.tca_cod = mte.mte_tca_cod ) AND
										( tca.tca_ind_cr = 'S' ) ) ) OR 
			  ( EXISTS ( SELECT udp_valor FROM udp 
								WHERE ( udp.udp_mte_serie_dep = mte.mte_serie ) AND
										( udp.udp_mte_seq_dep = mte.mte_seq ) ) ) ) 

---- OK 3

UNION ALL 

  SELECT  top 10 
        nfs.nfs_tipo as NR_TIPO_TITULO, 
        nfs.nfs_serie as NR_SERIE_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_numero as NR_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_dt_emis as DT_EMISSAO_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_dt_vcto as DT_VENCIMENTO_TITULO,

        nfs.nfs_vlr_multa as VL_MULTA,   
        cnv.cnv_nome as DS_CONVENIO,
